Package com.bitsavior.entity

Class LightedEntity

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.entity.Entity
com.bitsavior.entity.LightedEntity
public class LightedEntity
extends Entity
a lighted entity contains functionality for manipulating lightsources and display visual effects

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  LightedEntity.EffectType
    represents a type of effect for the lightsource

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean brighter
    internal variable for checking if brightening or darkening is needed(flicker, pulsate)
    private long effectAnimationTime
    holds the desired time in milliseconds for the translation between two states of the effect
    private boolean flicker
    true if flicker is desired
    private boolean grow
    internal variable for checking if a growth or shrink is needed(size change)
    private LightSource light
    lightsource for the lighted entity
    private float maxLightDiameter
    maximum diameter of the lightsource for the size change effect
    private float minLightDiameter
    minimum diameter of the lightsource for the size change effect
    private boolean pulsating
    true if pulsating is desired
    private boolean sizeChange
    true if size change is desired
    private long timer
    internal value that holds the time elapsed in milliseconds since the last effect

    Fields inherited from class com.bitsavior.entity.Entity

    isAlive, velocity

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    LightedEntity​(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager manager)
    constructor sets a red dot for the lighted entity and a red light light for the lightsource
    LightedEntity​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture lightedObject, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture light)
    constructor sets the textures, attaches the lightsource and set the timer for the effects

    • LightedEntity

      public LightedEntity​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture lightedObject, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture light)

      Parameters:
      lightedObject - : texture for the lighted entity
      light - : texture for the lightsource

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      updates the logic for the lighted entity checks the timer and activate required effects

    • setEffect

      public void setEffect​(LightedEntity.EffectType type)
      sets the desired effect for the lightsource
      Parameters:
      type - : type of effect for the lightsource

    • setEffect

      public void setEffect​(LightedEntity.EffectType type, long effectTimer)
      sets the desired effect for the lightsource and sets the effect timer
      Parameters:
      type - : type of effect for the lightsource
      effectTimer - : the desired time in milliseconds for the translation between two states of the effect

    • setLightRadius

      public void setLightRadius​(float radius)
      sets the radius of the attached lightsource
      Parameters:
      radius - : radius of the lightsource

    • setSizeChangeDiameter

      Parameters:
      minLightDiameter - : minimum diameter of the lightsource for the size change effect
      maxLightDiameter - : maximum diameter of the lightsource for the size change effect
